summary: THREE FAILURES BETWEEN 40000-69,500 MILES! WINDSHIELD WIPERS ARE ERRATIC. SOME TIMES OPERATE BY THEMSELVES, WON'T RETURN TO NORMAL POSITION, ETC. PAID DEALER TO REPAIR DEFECTIVE SWITCH THE FIRST TIME, 'DEFECTIVE' MOTOR THE SECOND TIME, AND NOW HAVE EXACT SAME PROBLEM AGAIN. I REFUSE TO PAY FOR REPAIRS THIRD TIME. OBVIOUSLY A FACTORY DEFECT. ---DIMS 11 IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS----769749. *AK
